Title: The Gold Violin
Plot: Don buys a new car; Pete, Harry and Ken strategize to attract new business; Don's secretary makes a grave error; Cooper has a new piece of art in his office.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Marie Jacquemetton, Andre Jacquemetton, Jane Anderso
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Melinda McGraw, Patrick Fischler, Peyton List
